suggested_improvements: Gain more experience with microservices architecture
Deepen knowledge of cloud services beyond AWS

records.title: Junior Python Developer
records.summary: Passionate Python Developer with 2+ years of experience in building scalable RESTful APIs and full-stack web applications. Proficient in Django, Next.js, React.js, and modern state management tools such as Zustand and Redux, with strong expertise in PostgreSQL. Skilled in implementing CI/CD pipelines, containerizing applications with Docker, and deploying to AWS for reliable cloud-based workflows.

education.school: ELDO MOR BASELIOS COLLEGE, CALICUT UNIVERSITY

experience.title: Junior Python Developer
experience.description: Develop RESTful APIs with Django and Python, and build interactive UIs using React.js and Next.js. Implement state management with Zustand and Context API, and manage PostgreSQL database design and queries. Collaborate in Agile sprints, conduct code reviews, and work alongside the DevOps team, gaining hands-on exposure to CI/CD, Docker, and AWS deployment processes.

experience.title: Python Developer Trainee
experience.description: Participated in a structured training program aimed at evaluating technical and team collaboration skills. Gained practical exposure to full-stack development by supporting bug fixes and UI tasks.

experience.title: Python Developer Intern
experience.description: Worked on practice projects to strengthen Python, OOP, and basic web development skills.
